item.title: Using Wrong-Way Driving Detection Data to Identify Factors That Affect Wrong-Way Driving Behavior and Compare Detection Technologies
TRB 2022: Freeway and Regional Transportation Systems and Operations 2022
item.description: This presentation was sponsored by the Standing Committee on Freeway Operations (ACP20) and Standing Committee on Regional Transportation Systems Management and Operations (ACP10). Its associated paper number was TRBAM-22-01598. Note that although I was not the lead author, I presented the poster due to the main author being unable to attend.
